text: The following is a list of notable events and releases of the year 1920 in Norwegian music. ==Events== ==Deaths== ==Births== ; January * 11 – Ole Henrik Moe, pianist, art historian, and critic (died 2013). ; February * 15 – Rolf Andersen, trumpeter, orchestra conductor, and bandleader (died 2016). * 16 — Karsten Andersen, orchestra conductor (died 1997). ; August * 3 – Jonas Brunvoll, Jr., operatic singer and actor (died 1982). * 28 – Rowland Greenberg, trumpeter, vocalist, and bandleader (died 1994). ==See also== * 1920 in Norway * Music of Norway ==References== Category:Norwegian music Norwegian Music Category:1920s in Norwegian music
title: 1920 in Norwegian music
